Abstract: Tim Race article holds that if 20th century is any indication, the way people live may not change in century ahead as radically as anticipated technological advances might suggest; photo; graph (M)
Snippet: Tim Race article holds that if 20th century is any indication, the way people live may not change in century ahead as radically as anticipated technological advances might suggest; photo; graph (M)
LeadParagraph: TECHNOLOGY may leap, but anthropology creeps.

Headline.Main: Technology Sprints, but Users Set Their Own Pace
Headline.PrintHeadline: VISIONS: TECHNOLOGY; Technology Sprints, but Users Set Their Own Pace
